content: are you ready to take interlocking crochet to the next level how about working with nets of triangles this pattern is provided in collaboration with the amazing kate dudman 1 creator of the interlocking crochet world 2 facebook page who figured out this technique the pattern provides both row-by-row written instructions as well as a design chart for reference a youtube tutorial is also provided to teach this triangle interlocking crochet technique the tutorial is divided into two parts * take interlocking crochet to the next level with nets of triangles part i 3 - covers set-up learning all the stitches and working the increasing row * take interlocking crochet to the next level with nets of triangles part ii 4 - covers working the decreasing row borders and joining the motifs are you up for the challenge what will you make with this snowflake snowflake motif there is even a blank chart included to try out your new skill and design a project of your own **gauge ** 6 triangle mesh stitches & 7 row = 4 **yardage ** lavender mc - 135 yds white cc - 125 yds the model was created with worsted weight yarn however any yarn and appropriate size hook can be used for this project this pattern is written in u s terms additional terms and symbols are used to define the triangle mesh stitches and floating stitches for this project 1 https //www ravelry com/people/complexkate 2 https //www facebook com/groups/1725736064372336 3 https //youtu be/r-w2aao-tdg 4 https //youtu be/v3y927jdmrw
